metadata.dc:author: González de Aledo, A
Alvarez Alduán, F
Pérez Santos, C
metadata.dc:description: A study on the content of free fluoride in 39 milk formulae available in Spain. The selective ion electrode method has been selected. All formulae but one supply F amounts inadequate for cavities prophylaxis. Additional F should before be routinely administered per os in the form of sodium fluoride.
metadata.dc:title: Contenido de flúor libre en leches infantiles españolas.
[Free fluoride content in Spanish infant formulas].
